tasks.label: Git Commit and Run MkDocs
tasks.command: if [ ! -d .git ]; then echo 'Initializing new Git repo...'; git init; fi && git add . && git commit -m 'Update documentation' && chmod +x ./run-mkdocs.sh && ./run-mkdocs.sh

tasks.label: Markdown MCP
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m fastMcp/md_converter.py
